title: Lexer and parser for .asm file produced by objdump
content: Is there any existing project that parses the x86 disassembly file or .asm produced by the objdump or IDA pro using the lexer and parser library in python or any other programming language?

comments.text: For what purpose? Syntax checking? Logical flow analysis? Compiling into an executable?
It for generating AST by taking as .asm input than to lift to IR. do you know any exciting projects or link?
